wikipedia_page.main: Eric Oliver (born 8 July 1940) is an English former amateur footballer who played as a goalkeeper in the Football League for Darlington and in non-league football for West Auckland Town.

response: Eric Oliver (1911–1980) was an English motorcycle racer.
Eric Oliver may also refer to:
* Eric Oliver (footballer) (born 1940), English former amateur footballer
* Eric Oliver (1914–1995), lover of Denton Welch
